title: Most influential people in biopharma—the scientists
author: Eric Sagonowsky; Kevin Dunleavy; Max Bayer; Andrea Park; Gabrielle Masson
description: This is the second in a four-part series profiling the people shaping the biopharma industry. We kickstarted with the most influential CEOs. The third report focused on entrepreneurs. The last section profiled influential regulators and advocates. | Without science, biopharma wouldn't exist. Without new, groundbreaking science, it might exist, but it wouldn't be very exciting—and it certainly wouldn't be a trillion-dollar enterprise. That's why our look at this year's most influential people had to turn to scientists next.
